headline: Has Hubbell’s Multi Year Surge Left Limited Upside Amid Grid Modernization Optimism?
summary: If you are wondering whether Hubbell is still worth buying after its big multi year run, this is a good moment to step back and ask what you are really paying for. The stock has cooled off recently, slipping about 0.5% over the last week, 9.0% over the past month, and is only up 1.8% year to date after an 81.6% gain over 3 years and 188.4% over 5 years. Investors have been digesting a mix of macro headlines around infrastructure spending, grid modernization, and industrial capital...
